```{r load_libraries, echo = F, message = F}
library(knitr)
library(data.table)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r setup}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath(".."))
```

This creates an RData object that has the cleaned up taxonomy tables for species
and genus, where the species/genera that were identified as contaminants with
decontam in `Cameroon_taxonomy_decontam.Rmd` are removed. All the column headers
are cleaned up. 

```{r, eval = F}

mod_table <- fread("~/projects1/microbiome_calculus/iberian/05-results.backup/Iberian_samples-controls_comparison_species.txt") %>%
  select(matches("Data|JAE|VLC|EXB015.A2301|LIB007.A0119|EXB015.A2901|LIB007.A0124")) %>%
  adorn_totals(where = "col") %>%
  filter(Total > 0) %>%
  select(-Total)

colnames(mod_table) <- gsub(".unmapped","", colnames(mod_table))


fwrite(mod_table, "./05-results.backup/mod_malt_species_raw.tsv")

```


Read in the full species and genus tables.
```{r load_data}
# MALT tables
mid_raw <- fread("./05-results.backup/MID_malt_bactarchhomo2018_comparison-species.txt")
radcliffe_raw <- fread("./05-results.backup/Radcliffe_pfuT_comparison-species.txt")
kilteasheen_raw <- fread("./05-results.backup/Kilteasheen_comparison-species.txt")
iberian_raw <- fread("./05-results.backup/iberian_medieval_malt_species_raw.tsv")
mod_raw <- fread("./05-results.backup/mod_malt_species_raw.tsv")

# contaminants
mid_contaminants <- fread("./05-results.backup/contaminant_species_mid.tsv", sep = "\t")
iber_contaminants <- fread("./05-results.backup/contaminant_species_iber.tsv", sep = "\t")
rad_contaminants <- fread("./05-results.backup/contaminant_species_rad.tsv", sep = "\t")

mid_contaminants_freq <- fread("./05-results.backup/contaminant_species_freq_mid.tsv", sep = "\t")
iber_contaminants_freq <- fread("./05-results.backup/contaminant_species_freq_iber.tsv", sep = "\t")
kil_contaminants_freq <- fread("./05-results.backup/contaminant_species_freq_kil.tsv", sep = "\t")
mod_contaminants_freq <- fread("./05-results.backup/contaminant_species_freq_jae.tsv", sep = "\t")

```

```{r clean_tables_prev}
# remove contaminant species from MID/CMD
mid_species_decontam_prev <- mid_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., mid_contaminants)

# remove contaminant species from Iberian medieval samples
iberian_species_decontam_prev <- iberian_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., iber_contaminants)

# remove contaminant species from Iberian medieval samples
radcliffe_species_decontam_prev <- radcliffe_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., rad_contaminants)

# remove contaminant species from JAE/VLC
mod_species_decontam_prev <- mod_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., rad_contaminants)

```

```{r clean_tables_freq}
# remove contaminant species from MID/CMD
mid_species_decontam_freq <- mid_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., mid_contaminants_freq)

# remove contaminant species from Iberian medieval samples
iberian_species_decontam_freq <- iberian_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., iber_contaminants_freq)

# remove contaminant species from Kilteasheen
kilteasheen_species_decontam_freq <- kilteasheen_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., kil_contaminants_freq)

# remove contaminant species from both JAE and VLC modern
mod_species_decontam_freq <- mod_raw %>%
  rename(Species = `#Datasets`) %>%
  anti_join(., mod_contaminants_freq)

```

```{r join_raw_tables}

all_species_raw <- mid_raw %>%
  full_join(., radcliffe_raw) %>%
  full_join(., kilteasheen_raw) %>%
  full_join(., iberian_raw) %>%
  full_join(., mod_raw)


# clean the file names
all_species_raw <- rename(all_species_raw, Species = `#Datasets`)
colnames(all_species_raw) <- gsub(".unmapped","", colnames(all_species_raw))
colnames(all_species_raw) <- gsub("MeganServer::","", colnames(all_species_raw))

all_species_raw <- all_species_raw %>%
  filter(!str_detect(Species, "Homo sapiens|Not assigned")) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0)
  
```


```{r join_decontam_tables_prev}
all_species_decontam_prev <- mid_species_decontam_prev %>%
  full_join(., radcliffe_species_decontam_prev) %>%
  full_join(., kilteasheen_species_decontam_freq) %>%
  full_join(., iberian_species_decontam_prev) %>%
  full_join(., mod_species_decontam_prev)


# clean the file names
colnames(all_species_decontam_prev) <- gsub(".unmapped","", colnames(all_species_decontam_prev))
colnames(all_species_decontam_prev) <- gsub("MeganServer::","", colnames(all_species_decontam_prev))

# remove human and unassigned reads, convert NA to 0, and remove the 8 MID samples with no metadata
all_species_decontam_prev <- all_species_decontam_prev %>% 
  filter(!str_detect(Species, "Homo sapiens|Not assigned")) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>%
  # these samples have no metadata
  select(-c("MID025.A0101","MID033.A0101","MID052.A0101","MID056.A0101","MID065.A0101","MID068.A0101","MID076.A0101","MID078.A0101")) %>%
  # remove Radcliffe soil and dentin
  select(-c("CSS","CSD")) %>%
  # remove any taxa that are not present in the remaining samples
  adorn_totals(where = "col") %>%
  filter(Total > 0) %>%
  select(-Total) %>%
  arrange(Species)


```

```{r join_decontam_tables_freq}
all_species_decontam_freq <- mid_species_decontam_freq %>%
  full_join(., radcliffe_species_decontam_prev) %>%
  full_join(., kilteasheen_species_decontam_freq) %>%
  full_join(., iberian_species_decontam_freq) %>%
  full_join(., mod_species_decontam_freq)


# clean the file names
colnames(all_species_decontam_freq) <- gsub(".unmapped","", colnames(all_species_decontam_freq))
colnames(all_species_decontam_freq) <- gsub("MeganServer::","", colnames(all_species_decontam_freq))

# remove human and unassigned reads, convert NA to 0, and remove the 8 MID samples with no metadata
all_species_decontam_freq <- all_species_decontam_freq %>% 
  filter(!str_detect(Species, "Homo sapiens|Not assigned")) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>%
  # these samples have no metadata
  select(-c("MID025.A0101","MID033.A0101","MID052.A0101","MID056.A0101","MID065.A0101","MID068.A0101","MID076.A0101","MID078.A0101")) %>%
  # remove Radcliffe soil and dentin
  select(-c("CSS","CSD")) %>%
  # remove any taxa that are not present in the remaining samples
  adorn_totals(where = "col") %>%
  filter(Total > 0) %>%
  select(-Total) %>%
  arrange(Species)


```

```{r save_data}
save(all_species_raw,
     all_species_decontam_prev,
     all_species_decontam_freq,
     file = "./05-results.backup/Taxonomy_tables.RData")


fwrite(all_species_raw, "./05-results.backup/malt_refseq_species.tsv", sep = "\t", quote = F)
```
